statements: SELECT * FROM sales_forecast;
SELECT id, date, product_id, quantity_sold FROM sales_forecast WHERE market_demand > 100;
SELECT date, quantity_sold, unit_price FROM sales_forecast WHERE product_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT id, market_demand FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY market_demand DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY date DESC, quantity_sold ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT date, SUM(quantity_sold * unit_price) AS total_revenue FROM sales_forecast WHERE market_demand > 0.8 GROUP BY date;
SELECT product_id, AVG(unit_price) AS avg_price FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_price DESC;
SELECT date, product_id, quantity_sold, unit_price, market_demand FROM sales_forecast WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE sales_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT * FROM market_demand WHERE demand_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT * FROM market_demand ORDER BY demand_forecast ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT sales_date, sales_amount, product_id FROM sales_forecast WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_id, sales_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE sales_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sales_amount DESC;
SELECT SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales, sales_date FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY sales_date HAVING total_sales > 5000;
SELECT s.product_id, s.sales_amount, d.demand_forecast FROM sales_forecast s INNER JOIN market_demand d ON s.product_id = d.product_id WHERE d.demand_date = '2021-09-30';
SELECT sales_date, SUM(sales_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY sales_date ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast;
SELECT product_id, sales_date, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, prediction_date, predicted_quantity FROM sales_predictions WHERE predicted_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM market_demand WHERE demand_level BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM market_demand WHERE demand_level > 50 ORDER BY demand_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sales FROM sales_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT sp.product_id, sp.prediction_date, sp.predicted_quantity, sf.sales_date, sf.quantity_sold FROM sales_predictions sp JOIN sales_forecast sf ON sp.product_id = sf.product_id;
SELECT sd.product_id, sd.demand_date, sd.demand_level, sf.sales_date, sf.revenue FROM market_demand sd LEFT JOIN sales_forecast sf ON sd.product_id = sf.product_id;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast sf INNER JOIN sales_predictions sp ON sf.product_id = sp.product_id AND sf.revenue < sp.predicted_revenue ORDER BY sf.revenue;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast;
SELECT id, sale_date, forecasted_sales FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_info WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product_info WHERE price > 100;
SELECT id, demand_date, demand_level FROM market_demand ORDER BY demand_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_info WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT demand_date, demand_level FROM market_demand WHERE demand_level IN ('High', 'Medium') AND product_id = 1001;
SELECT sale_date AS date, forecasted_sales AS forecast FROM sales_forecast WHERE product_id = 2002 AND forecasted_sales > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(actual_sales) AS average_sales FROM sales_history GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(actual_sales) > 500;
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_forecast WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_forecast WHERE sale_amount > 500
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_forecast WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM sales_forecast ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_history WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales_history GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT sales_history.sale_date, sales_forecast.product_name FROM sales_history JOIN sales_forecast ON sales_history.sale_date = sales_forecast.sale_date;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 500 ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5;
